title: Amazon DynamoDB Stream to AWS Step Functions
description: Invoke AWS Step Functions workflow from a Amazon DynamoDB stream message

introBox.headline: Invoke a Step Functions workflow from a DynamoDB stream
text: This sample project demonstrates how to invoke an AWS Step Functions state machine directly from a DynamoDB Stream using Amazon EventBridge Pipes.
This pattern deploys one Step Function, one DynamoDB with stream enabled, and one Amazon EventBridge Pipe.

bullets.text: Amazon EventBridge Pipes - connects sources to targets.

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
